node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Laura | Inspire My Play ® on September 02, 2021. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text:
LEAF IDENTIFICATION PEBBLES
.
We’re feeling super excited to start the autumn/fall play soon! Awhile back we made these leaf pebbles as a handy resource to identify the many leaves we pick up on walks! They’re also lots of fun to make! 🍂 
.
Here’s how to make some yourself:
.
What You Will Need:
.
•Large pebbles
•Small leaves
•Mod Podge
•Flower press or microwave
.
How to:
.
1. The first step is to press the leaves. This can be done in a flower press or for a shortcut method use a microwave!
.
2. To use a microwave put the leaves between two pieces of kitchen towel and then between two dinner plates, with a cup of water in the microwave too and heat for 20-30 seconds. The cup of water is really important to ensure the leaves don’t catch fire so don’t forget it!
.
3. Cover the pebbles with a layer of Mod Podge and then stick the leaves to them.
.
4. Cover the leaf and pebble with a second layer of Mod Podge paying special attention to the corners of the leaf to make sure they are stuck down well. An adult might need to do this bit.
.
5. Once everything is dry you can write the name of the leaf on the back of the pebble using a permanent marker or acrylic paint pen. 🍂 🍃 🍁 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#learningthroughplay #playideas #playingathome #playathome #letthemplay #learnthroughplay #playmatters #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #playbasedlearning #homeschool #homeschoolpreschool #homeeducation #playathomemum
#preschoolplay #eyfs #eyfsteacher #eyfsideas #teachermum 
#diymum #150hoursoutside
#playtolearn #earlychildhoodeducation #funforkids #inspiremyplay #autumnplay #fallactivities

node.text:
*GIVEAWAY NOW CLOSED* Winner to be announced shortly
.
CONNETIX WORLDWIDE GIVEAWAY
.
We’re celebrating 300K by giving away 3 sets of our favourite magnetic tiles from @connetix_tiles!
.
3 lucky people will win @connetix_tiles’ NEW 120 creative set in the most stunning range of pastel colours 😍 🌈 
.
To be in with a chance of winning you need to:
.
1) Make sure you follow both @connetix_tiles AND @inspiremyplay
2) LIKE and SAVE this post
3) Tag as many friends as you like in comments below. Each tag in separate comments is a new entry.
4) For a bonus entry, share in your stories. Don’t forget to tag us so we can count your entry.
.
And that’s it!
.
This giveaway is open now and closes on Friday 3rd September at 8pm BST.
.
Open WORLDWIDE to anyone over 18 years-old. This giveaway is in no way endorsed or linked to Instagram.
.
Winners will be announced within 48 hours and prizes will be delivered when they are in stock in your region.
.
Please note the winners will be announced on this post. Please do not give out your details to anyone claiming you have won without checking on here first.
.
Photo credit-@x_macy_and_ollie_x 

.
.
.
.
.
.

node.text:
JELLY LETTER DIG
.
I love thinking up playful ways to practice letters! This was an instant hit with mine and I love the way it can be adapted for different stages/needs.
.
There’s a couple of activities shown here but you can also extend this to match letters to pictures with the same initial sound or to practice word building- this could be a missing sound in a word or building up the whole cvc word by retrieving all the letters out of the jelly.
.
We used gelatine powder and a bit of food colouring. It’s an easy way to make lots of different colours. The PlayTRAY segments are perfect for this as the gelatine sets really well whereas I have made a whole tray before which takes a lot of time and gelatine to set! They’re also much easier to stack in the fridge!
.
I’ll be putting these alphabet sheets up on our Playful Printables member pages incase you want to download them. And as always you can purchase the PlayTRAY on our website in U.K. & the US (www.inspiremyplaystore.com). 
.
For our EU customers we’ve just found we can send it to most places via our Amazon U.K. listing. This was a complete surprise to us but appears to be working well. I’ve already had some lovely messages from people telling me their PlayTRAY has arrived and with no customs bill! 🎉 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#playtray #playtrayideas #learningthroughplay #sensoryplay #sensorylearning #specialeducation #sensorybin #asdmom #asdkids #teachersofinstagram #sensoryprocessing #playathome #learnthroughplay #earlyyears #eyfsteacher #earlylearning101 #earlylearning #eyfs #earlychildhoodeducation #playmatters #occupationaltherapyforkids #inspiremyplaytray #waterplay #looseparts #smallworldplay #inspiremyplay #eyfsideas #messyplayideas

node.text:
MATH WITH LOOSE PARTS
.
Here are some different ways we used loose parts to explore mathematical concepts. We were practising number recognition, 1-1 correspondence (careful counting) and also sharing equally (butterfly wing activity).
.
Each activity used some cardboard discs that I made with numbers 1-10 written on one side and 11-20 on the other and then I used a dry wipe pen for the rest- quick and easy 👌
.
We used our @joguines_grapat mandala pieces which we absolutely love but you could also use any loose parts for these activities- pebbles, buttons, pom-poms, petals, leaves... whatever you can lay your hands on!
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#inspiremyplay #onehundredtoys #grapat #grapatmandala #woodentoys #looseparts #loosepartsplay #learningthroughplay #playtolearn #playactivities #mathsactivities #mathsplay #earlyyears #learningathome #playathome #playmatters #homeschool #mathactivities

node.text:
FELT BALL/POM-POM RESCUE
.
This takes just a few minutes to set up but is such a great work out for little hands!
.
The idea is to pick up the felt balls through the gaps in the elastic bands. We used the PlayTRAY lid to hold our felt balls but any shallow container would work well.
.
The squeezy tweezers from @learningresourcesuk are perfect for this but regular tweezers are great too.
.
You can do all sorts of things to extend this activity- sort the balls into colours, count the balls into each pot, sort by size etc...
.
Using giant elastic bands makes this activity so easy to set up but as an alternative you can wrap your tray in some masking tape or washi-tape.
.
PlayTRAY is available to buy from our website: www.inspiremyplaystore.com @inspiremyplaystore 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#finemotorplay

node.text:
PETAL FLAMINGO *FREE PRINTABLE*
.
After seeing @treasuretrays make a nature flamingo last summer I knew I had to try it with the left over hydrangea petals from our ice play!
.
This provided a calm half hour this afternoon whilst all 3 sat down and added petal feathers to their flamingoes.
.
If you would like to try it too, you can download the flamingo printable from our Playful Printables homepage- www.inspiremyplay.com/playfulprintables (I’ll put the link in stories too). Just scroll to the bottom for all the freebies.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#inspiremyplay #natureplay #natureplay #naturelearning #inspiremyplay #outdoorplay #natureart #natureactivities #holidayfun #learnthroughplay #playathome #playmatters #earlylearning #eyfs #earlychildhoodeducation #playactivities #inspiremyplay #montessoriathome #montessoriactivity #earlyyears #earlyyearsideas #eyfs #kidsactivities #artykids #creativeplay

node.text:
FROZEN FLOWER DISCS
.
Anyone who watched my stories last week will know that we’ve been experimenting with trying to create clear ice. We didn’t quite achieve the perfectly clear ice I’d hoped for but we’ve still had lots of fun making and playing with these flower and leaf ice discs!
.
I did a similar activity a couple of years back and my older two loved it, so I wanted to recreate it for my little Miss. I’ve held on to this same piece of food packaging for two years as it makes the most perfect little round discs! 
.
We popped flowers/ leaves from the garden in each hole, topped them up with water and placed in the freezer.
.
To attempt to make the water clear I boiled it twice and let it cool. It definitely helped a bit but I’ve been given several other ideas to try since, so we will give those a go when we get a chance.
.
Once ready, I popped these all in the PlayTRAY and gave Miss 3 the lid of the PlayTRAY to play on. She made repeating patterns with the discs, built towers with them and had fun sliding them around the glossy PlayTRAY lid! When her big sisters joined in later they then used them for some concoctions in the mud kitchen!
.
The PlayTRAY is now available to buy in the US as well as the U.K. We’re also now shipping to Canada from our US warehouse. 🎉 More info at www.inspiremyplaystore.com
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#everydayplayhacks  #learningthroughplay #playideas #playathome #letthemplay #simpleplay #learnthroughplay #playmatters #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #playbasedlearning #homeschoolpreschool #homeeducationuk

node.text:
HIDDEN LETTERS
.
We love this activity! It takes minutes to set up but is so versatile and fun to do!
.
Write some letters on a page using a white crayon and then use watercolour paints to reveal the letters. As your child discovers a letter encourage them to say the sound.
.
Alternatively you can replace the letters with CVC words or tricky (sight) words- whatever needs to be worked on. ☺️
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#phonics #phonicsfun #phonicsforkids #phonicsactivities 
#learningthroughplay #playideas #playathome #learnthroughplay #playmatters #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #playbasedlearning #homeschool #homeschoolpreschool #homeeducation
#preschoolactivity #preschoolathome #eyfs #eyfsideas 
#playtolearn #earlylearning101 #handsonlearning #activitiesforkids #earlychildhoodeducation #kidsatplay #inspiremyplay

node.text:
MOON PLAY TRAY
.
This is such a fun sensory play experience for any space enthusiasts and with the PlayTRAY lid you can keep it nice to return to over a few days/weeks or longer!
.
This moon scape was created using cloud dough (sometimes actually called moon sand!). It’s made from flour and oil and is soft and crumbly but mouldable too.
.
To make cloud dough I mix 4 cups of flour with  1/2 cup of vegetable oil.
.
To create this colour I grated a small piece of charcoal into the mixture. You can also add colour using chalk or powder paint, as well as some dry food ingredients like hot chocolate powder or spices.
.
Other things I added to this tray were some stones, glass pebbles and our @safariltd toobs space set. Safari do a huge selection of small world play sets that are definitely worth a look if you have a particular theme in mind for a play set up.
.
We are now shipping the PlayTRAY from our US warehouse! Find out more via the link in my bio or check it out at @inspiremyplaystore 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#playideas #playathome #letthemplay #learnthroughplay #playmatters #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #playbasedlearning
#preschoolplay
#preschoolactivity #eyfs #eyfsathome #eyfsideas
#sensoryplay #sensorybin #playtray

node.text:
TINFOIL DRAGONFLIES
.
Here’s a simple craft project using tinfoil and sweet wrappers! We love using tinfoil for crafting- it’s so easy to manipulate into shapes and mess free!
.
First create the bodies of the dragonflies by rolling up and shaping a piece of tinfoil and then cover them in sweet wrappers or bits of tissue paper. They can be decorated however you like but we wound string around ours and then made wings from tissue paper and cellphone. We finished off the dragonflies with googly eyes and bits of pipe cleaner dug into the foil to make antennae.
.
This craft was inspired by an activity in Usborne Books 365 things to do with paper and cardboard. If you’re on the look out for a craft book requiring minimal additional resources, this is one we’ve enjoyed a lot. 👌
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#playideas #playathome #letthemplay 
#lockdownactivities #playmatters  #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #homeschool #homeschoolpreschool #homeeducation
#preschoolplay 
#preschoolactivity #preschoolathome #eyfs #eyfsteacher #eyfsideas
#diymum #creativeplay #invitationtoplay #earlylearning101 #activitiesforkids #earlychildhoodeducation #kidsatplay #artforkids #funforkids

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Laura | Inspire My Play ® on August 14, 2021.

node.text:
LEAF SHADOW DRAWING 🍃🌞
.
This is great fun for a sunny day!
.
I set this up by pegging leaves on some string hung between two chairs. Underneath I rolled out a big piece of paper and we traced around the shadows created by the leaves.
.
This is a great fine motor challenge and good for concentration and observational skills, as well as being a great conversation starter to talk about shadows. Mine enjoyed colouring them afterwards and adding details to their leaves. 🍃 
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#inspiremyplay #learningathome #playathome #learningthroughplay #playmatters #finemotorskills #finemotor #stemplay #stemeducation #stemeducationforkids #kidslearning #funforkids letthemplay #learnthroughplay #playmatters #earlyyears #earlylearning #playislearning #playbasedlearning #homeschool #homeeducation #playathomemum
#eyfs #eyfsteacher #eyfsideas

node.text:
Congratulations to our winner @thebeachclassroom ! 🎉
.
GIVEAWAY CLOSED- WINNER TO BE ANNOUNCED SHORTLY
.
WORLDWIDE GIVEAWAY
.
It’s giveaway time! It’s been a big week for us launching the PlayTRAY in the US and we wanted to celebrate with a worldwide giveaway!
.
To win a PlayTRAY & a copy of our PlayTRAY e-book all you need to do is:
.
1.Follow both @inspiremyplay AND @inspiremyplaystore
2.LIKE & SAVE this post.
3.Leave a comment to tell me what your favourite sensory play activity is!
4.Tag as many friends as you like in the comments below. Each tag in separate comments is an additional entry.
.
If you would like a bonus entry please share this giveaway in your stories. Make sure you tag me so I can record your entry 😊
.
This giveaway closes on Saturday 14th August at 9pm BST. Winner will be announced within 48 hours. Please note the winner will be announced on this post. Please do not give out your details to anyone claiming you have won without checking on here first.
.
Open WORLDWIDE to anyone over 18 years-old. This giveaway is in no way endorsed or linked to Instagram. Contents of PlayTRAY not included. Please note, depending on where the winner is located there may be local customs and duties to pay before your prize can be delivered.
.
Best of luck!
.
.
.
.
.
.
